main.name: Wesley Peck
main.description: Technical Product Manager and people leader with specialties in DevTools, Ecommerce, Supply Chain, and Support Technology
main.bio: Hi there - I'm Wesley. I'm a technical product manager, educator, and small business consultant. My area of expertise is the intersection of people and technology; I bridge the gap between engineering jargon and a customer's experience. I've got FAANG experience, I thrive in ambiguity, and I like to laugh.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Concentration in Corporate Finance. Focused on financial valuation and data analysis for small businesses
Focused on linguistics and literary analysis of modern American literature, specifically the Southern Gothics

work.title: Senior Product Manager - Technical
work.description: Owned and managed the product portfolio, strategy, and vision for AWS Amplify web consoles, including Amplify Studio and the Amplify Gen2 console.

work.title: Technical Product Manager
work.description: Managed the strategy and backlog for Petco's Ecommerce order management and inventory management systems.

work.title: Product Manager - Support Technology
work.description: Owned and managed the product roadmap and backlog for call center and ITSM products.

work.title: Lead Technology Support Analyst
work.description: Led team of four technology support analysts for IT Help Desk call center.

resume.skillmessage: I have a blend of hard and soft skills that allow me to build trust and repoire with technical and non-technical stakeholders alike.

proficiencies.title: Twilio
proficiencies.summary: Build a VoIP round-robin tool to replace the primary IT Help Desk phone system at University of San Diego.

proficiencies.title: Figma
proficiencies.summary: Extensive experience with FigJam. Some experience building components with an existing design library.

proficiencies.summary: Extensive experience using Asana for Product Management, Project Management, and data collection via forms.
